Name: Pillar
About the game: Lost in an intimate snowy town, a palette of individuals are in search of a mysterious artifact said to bring great knowledge and understanding. Lead each character through their quest in this collection of minigames, each with unique personalities and challenges... maybe their paths aren't so different after all. A Little Bit More About Pillar: A collection of minigames, each representing different personality traits (introversion, extroversion etc.) through gameplay mechanics. Different people, different gameplay; each part of the game will challenge you in a unique way. Explore an intimate snowy town, beautifully hand-painted with attention to every detail. A distinct soundtrack, composed hand in hand with the game's design, by the game's designer, to ensure a cohesive experience.
Meta Title: Pillar: May 29, 2015, MichaelArts and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Pillar? Check out the release date (May 29, 2015), developer insights from MichaelArts, and a complete game summary.
